data.name: Crest - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is part of our support package plan for Crest where you can help us in our Early Access effort, and getting something nice in return. This is a high quality soundtrack with FLAC and MP3 versions of the tracks. Will be updated after the full launch of the game.

01. "Golden Path" 01:48
02. "South Wind" 01:47
03. "Time's Breath" 01:42
04. "Creation Myth" 01:05
05. "Metamorphosis" 01:51
06. "Spirits" 00:28
07. "Warm Breeze" 00:23
08. "North Wind" 01:35
09. "Plenty" 00:51
10. "Crest" 01:00
11. "Crest (1992)" 01:35

Total Playing time: 14:05



To access the soundtrack's files after purchase go to the same folder where you can find Crest (Game Library>Properties>Browse Local Files...).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 graphics memory and shader model 2.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 graphics memory and shader model 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 graphics memory and shader model 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
